title: Sooo... Swain...
body: When will dragon master swain come out? we been waiting forever.

replies.body:
Hello,

I Never knew there was such a thing coming out?
Can you give me the source too this Information?
This seems very interesting as Id Like too see his Ability's.

-RedPandaFox

Riot has said they are going to make it, they did hope to have it for 2015, but there was no promise. Because it was never released in 2015, that means it was likely left until either 2016 or 2017 to release it, having fresh and unique particles.

http://apollo-eu-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1433269098/dragonmaster-swain.jpg


"We will do this skin - I'm sure of that."

**-** Morello

"We haven't forgotten about this skin. Not sure when it'll finally happen, I hope we can do it in 2015 but I can't promise anything.
Swain needs a badass legendary skin and giving him some awesome Dragon transformation anims would be really fun. Hype hype hype. I wanna animate dragons."

**-** Riot Whist
they have forgotten him gg

just gonna quote again "We haven't forgotten about this skin."

they just don't know when they will release it, but it was stated there is a possiblility that it will be the 2016 Ultimate skin.
Wanna actually imbed a quote? Or link to the post? When's it from? Just placing " on either side of a sentence isn't gonna give it merit
search it up, there is tonnes on it, you should find it all instantly.

Perhaps you search it yourself before asking...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Whist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EFYtLVfr,comment-id=00070001000c0000,timestamp=2015-12-05T01:46:40.859+0000)
>
> Just so nobody has any new expectations that will get crushed: Dragon Master Swain is not slotted for production at any point in 2016 currently. There was a glimmer of hope for the skin in 2015 when I posted that, but it wasn't able to happen.
> 
> 
> Sorry, I share your pain :\
nah that was a joke on his part. The skin was promised to us.
What part of that quote exactly reads to you as a joke?
he is in denial and lying to himself because he cannot admit it
all of it. Rito owes it to us.
Just like how they owed us Ao Shin. Now look where we are, 3 years from the leak, with a half transparent savage star lizard who doesn't even go flap flap or breathe the hot orange.
But they still did deliver a variation of him. Replace wind with starzzz and walla.

Its about 3 years after. And he was changed to A.Sol because the concept of his twisting body and shifting hair was just too hard for riot to do, and having such a large model, and a turning animation made it extremely unfair on him. You do realise that not all things can be done right? Ao shin was canceled because it was near impossible to make him properly fit into the game.
Yeah. They delivered a different version, 3 YEARS after the first leak. Don't get your hopes up for this Swain skin just yet.
When he's fucking reading that's when.
I didn't know Swain was illiterate!

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=85gvfJqA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-30T19:46:44.509+0000)
>
> I didn't know Swain was illiterate!

Yeah it's a real bummer.
Mesprit is giving me attention, does this mean I am the player in Sinnoh?

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=85gvfJqA,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-01T09:43:50.918+0000)
>
> Mesprit is giving me attention, does this mean I am the player in Sinnoh?

No, it means you are illiterate, sorry.
Ok...
